metadata.title: CVE-2017-14257 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In the SDK in Bento4 1.5.0-616, AP4_AtomSampleTable::GetSample in Core/Ap4AtomSampleTable.cpp contains a Read Memory Access Violation vulnerability. It is possible to exploit this vulnerability by opening a crafted .MP4 file.

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
